body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Linn E. Boyd. Father of Ward Boyd, Felix Boyd, and Butler Boyd. Attorney in McCracken County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in McCracken County in 1860. Appointed deputy postmaster in Paducah, Kentucky in 1860. Declined a commission as Major in the 40th Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) in January 1864.
